attributes.action: Place economic sanctions on the United States
attributes.background: The recognition of Jerusalem as the Israeli capitol has inflamed the Arab world and pushed the Israeli-Palestine towards further conflict. The apartheid regime in Israel will use this support to build more illegal settlements and justify encroachment on Palestinian land.

rejection.details:
Sanctions are mainly put in place by the United Nations (UN) and the European Union (EU). You can find out more about sanctions and embargoes here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/sanctions-embargoes-and-restrictions

You could start a new petition asking the UK to work with the UN and EU to impose trade sanctions on the United States of America, if that's what you want to happen.
